help-file.title: LIFESPAN
help-file.content:
Below is a chart that lists the starting and the maximum age of each race. Note that once you reach the maximum age for your race, your character, just like any old person starts to feel the affects of its years and will not have the stamina of its youth. A Necromancer can help using their powers of rejuvenation to bring life back to your old bones.
